title: Elder Hu
summary: A wandering sage who pens rings of nail that cage the foe.
overview: Dream warrior who conjures concentric nail rings that close in and force careful spacing.
where: Fungal Wastes — warrior’s grave in caverns between Queen’s Station and Mantis Village.
notes: Stand in the ring gaps and step through with dash timing; jump over ground rings, dash through air rings.

title: Galien
summary: A brave youth; a spectral wheel sweeps while his weapon spins.
overview: Fights with an orbiting spirit wheel while his nail spins and ricochets around the arena.
where: Deepnest — warrior’s grave in the tunnels near the tram route.
notes: Prioritize dodging the large wheel path; slip in brief hits after it passes. Keep eyes on the bouncing nail.

title: Gorb
summary: An ascetic who rains spears from above in radial patterns.
overview: Simple aerial duel: telegraphed lances appear in radial bursts from above.
where: Howling Cliffs — warrior’s grave on a high spire.
notes: Move diagonally between gaps; short hops and micro-dashes keep you safe between spear lines.

title: Markoth
summary: Hides behind a spinning shield while sending guided strikes.
overview: Defensive duel: a spinning shield orbits him (later two) while he fires guided nail spirits.
where: Kingdom’s Edge — warrior’s grave in cliffside chambers near the Hive approach.
notes: Circle just outside the shield’s path and poke after it passes. Later phase adds a second shield—keep lateral space.

title: Marmu
summary: A playful spirit that rebounds like a ball—quirky, fragile.
overview: Pinball-like fight: Marmu bounces rapidly and staggers from clean taps.
where: Queen’s Gardens — warrior’s grave in the lower garden rooms.
notes: Face the rebound angle: short taps then step aside for the return. Spells help if you’re cornered.

title: No Eyes
summary: A blind singer; her lament steers unseen projectiles through platforms.
overview: Haunting duel in darkness: floating projectiles drift through the platform maze to her song.
notes: Keep moving with the melody; walk off platform edges to realign safely, jump only when needed.

title: Xero
summary: A dream duelist with orbiting blades he hurls in bursts.
overview: Starts with two blades orbiting and throwing in sets; count increases in later phase.
where: City of Tears — platforms near the Memorial statue area.
notes: Dash through gaps as blades leave orbit; punish just after throws before they realign.
